subject: Re: [junit] Problems running automated tests of TestFirstDesigned GUI
msgSnippet: Sorry man I quoted the wrong thing to you.  The virtual frame buffer software I was talking about is called Xvfb and maybe you could find some info about it
messageBody:
Sorry man I quoted the wrong thing to you. The
virtual frame buffer software I was talking about is
called Xvfb and maybe you could find some info about
it here http://www.xfree86.org/4.0.2/Xvfb.1.html

--- Brian Button <bbutton01@...> wrote:
> I'd actually tried connecting to an X session I had
> started on the
> local machine, and that still gave the same
> Connection Refused errors,
> even after doing an xhost +. I'll try it again to
> see if I just left
> something out..
>
> Where can I find Xvdm? I've searched google, redhat,
> and a few other
> places, but I can't find it.
>
> Thanks,
> bab
>
> --
> Brian Button bbutton@...
> Senior Consultant Object Mentor, Inc
> St. Louis, MO http://www.objectmentor.com
>
>
